consentModal.title: We use cookies
consentModal.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua

sections.title: Your Privacy Choices
sections.description: In this panel you can express some preferences related to the processing of your personal information. You may review and change expressed choices at any time by resurfacing this panel via the provided link in the footer. To deny your consent to the specific processing activities described below, switch the toggles to off or use the “Reject all” button and confirm you want to save your choices.

sections.title: Strictly Necessary
sections.description: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of the website and cannot be disabled.

sections.title: Performance and Analytics
sections.description: These cookies collect information about how you use our website. All of the data is anonymized and cannot be used to identify you.

sections.title: More information
sections.description: For any queries in relation to our policy on cookies and your choices, please contact us
